title: runtime or net/http: possible hang
body:
Buildbot hang testing CL 19151:
https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/9875de36/darwin-amd64-10_10_15e7a318.log

The hang is in the net/http tests. It could be another runtime hang (but that CL does sit on top of the most recent fix), or it could be a net/http hang. Someone should diagnose.

/cc @aclements @bradfitz
